description: Public Works and Government Services has a requirement for Breakwater Wharf Repairs in Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Title**: EB144-232268 West Breakwater Repairs – Hall’s Harbour, Nova Scotia

**Tender Reference**: WS3972875056-Doc3972897166

**Publication Date**: April 20, 2023

**Closing Date**: May 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM

**Description:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is undertaking a tender process to select a suitable contractor to undertake the West Breakwater Repairs at Hall’s Harbour, Kings County, Nova Scotia. The project requires concrete infill work to fix a void under the wharf deck, which has caused the wharf core to subside and the breakwater stone to shift.

**Project Scope:**

* Furnish all necessary plant, equipment, labor, and materials for concrete infill work
* Complete the work within 12 weeks from the date of contract award

**Contract Value:**

* Estimated value: $100,001 to $500,000 CAD

**Bidding Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit their qualifications and a bid security to be considered for the contract
* The bid security will be required during Phase 2 of the tendering process

**Technical Specifications:**
Please refer to the tender documents for detailed technical specifications and requirements.

**Tender Documents:**
Available on the Ariba Discovery website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16055522?extsite=MTYwNTU1MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16055522?extsite=MTYwNTU1MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information:**
Dwyer, Alexandria (SPAC/PSPC)
alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
